DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect Lidocaine/epinephrine without Sufentanil rate anesthesia supplemental intraligamentary injection ( PDL ) teeth irreversible pulpitis .
DOC.criteria: patient age group 1865 year old healthy ( ASA I , II ) patient first second mandibular molar need endodontic treatment vital tooth without history past endodontic treatment patient clinical evidence irreversible Pulpits moderate severe pain patient sign consent form patient numbness lateral edge lip inferior alveolar injection ( INA ) positive respond maximum output pulp tester INA . pregnant nursing necrotic tooth patient allergy contraindication toward nonopioid opioid painkiller aspirin NSAIDs Patients take opioid non opioid steroid pain killer , antidepressant sedative drug past 48 hour patient infectious disease patient moderate sever periodontal disease without numbness lateral edge lip inferior alveolar injection ( INA ) , respond maximum output pulp tester INA .
